DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine structure transition program adolescent young adult Type 1 Diabetes ( T1D ) improve diabetes clinic attendance management well glycemic control transition pediatric adult diabetes care .
DOC.criteria: Established T1D diagnosis minimum one year ( choose allow time adjustment new diagnosis stable disease control ) . Between age 17 20 year . It leave clinical judgment pediatric endocrinologist determine individually appropriate age transition subject At least 1 visit previous year pediatric endocrinologist Diabetes Clinic ( aim minimize nonadherence intervention ) .
